docs.text: Bienvenido Card Ejemplo Basico import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color @Preview @Composable fun CardDemo(){ Card( ){ Column(){ Text( buildAnnotatedString{ append("welcome to ") withStyle(style= SpanStyle(fontWeight = FontWeight.W900,color= Color(0xFF4552B8))){ append("Jetpack Compose Playground") } } ) Text(text="Mas Texto") } } } Ejemplo completo Pongo este ejemplo completo porque es clickable @Composable fun CardDemo() { Card( modifier = Modifier .fillMaxWidth() .padding(15.dp) .clickable{ }, elevation = 10.dp ) { Column( modifier = Modifier.padding(15.dp) ) { Text( buildAnnotatedString { append("welcome to ") withStyle(style = SpanStyle(fontWeight = FontWeight.W900, color = Color(0xFF4552B8)) ) { append("Jetpack Compose Playground") } } ) Text( buildAnnotatedString { append("Now you are in the ") withStyle(style = SpanStyle(fontWeight = FontWeight.W900)) { append("Card") } append(" section") } ) } } }
